methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application. Prompts the user to select between CLI or GUI mode. Launches the selected interface or shows an error for invalid input.

methods.name: launch
methods.description: Launch the CLI application. Prints welcome message and enters the command input loop.

methods.name: convertToMillimeters
methods.description: Converts a value from the current unit to millimeters.
methods.returns: The value converted to millimeters

methods.name: runCli
methods.description: Main command processing loop. Reads user input, parses commands, and executes corresponding methods. Includes comprehensive error handling for graceful exit.

methods.name: handleLoft
methods.description: Helper method to handle loft command.

methods.name: help
methods.description: Displays a help message listing all available commands and their usage.

methods.name: version
methods.description: Prints the version information.

methods.name: exit
methods.description: Exits the application gracefully. Provides user feedback and ensures clean termination.

methods.name: createCube

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects size as second argument

methods.description: Creates a cube with the specified size and configured subdivisions.

methods.name: createSphere

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects radius as second argument

methods.description: Creates a sphere with the specified radius and configured subdivisions.

methods.name: setCubeDivisions

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects count as second argument

methods.description: Sets the number of subdivisions for cubes.

methods.name: setSphereDivisions

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects lat and lon as second and third

methods.description: Sets latitude and longitude subdivisions for spheres. arguments

methods.name: saveFile

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects filename as second argument

methods.description: Saves the current geometry to an STL file.

methods.name: sketchClear
methods.description: Clears all entities from the current sketch.

methods.name: exportDxf

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects filename as second argument

methods.description: Exports the current sketch to a DXF file.

methods.name: sketchPoint

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects x and y as second and third arguments

methods.description: Adds a point entity to the sketch.

methods.name: sketchLine

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects x1, y1, x2, y2 as arguments 2-5

methods.description: Adds a line entity to the sketch.

methods.name: sketchCircle

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects x, y, radius as arguments 2-4

methods.description: Adds a circle entity to the sketch.

methods.name: sketchPolygon
methods.description: Adds a polygon to the sketch. Supports two modes: - Regular polygon defined by center (x,y), radius, and number of sides - Polygon defined by explicit points (at least 3)

methods.name: sketchList
methods.description: Lists all entities currently in the sketch.

methods.name: extrudeRedirectToGUI
methods.description: Displays information about extrusion and redirects users to the GUI for better experience. The CLI no longer supports extrusion functionality as it's better suited for the GUI.

methods.name: loadFile

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects filename as second argument

methods.description: Loads an STL or DXF file.

methods.name: setUnits

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Command arguments, expects unit as second argument

methods.description: Sets the current measurement units. Supported units: mm, cm, m, in, ft

methods.name: handleCg
methods.description: Calculates and displays the Center of Gravity (CG) of the current model.

methods.name: handleNaca
methods.description: Handles the 'naca' command to generate an airfoil.

methods.name: handleRevolve
methods.description: Handles the 'revolve' command.

methods.name: handleUndo
methods.description: Handles undo command.

methods.name: handleRedo
methods.description: Handles redo command.

constructors.name: AddEntityCommand
constructors.signature: public AddEntityCommand(Sketch sketch, Entity entity, String entityType)

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Execute a command and add it to the undo history.

methods.name: undo
methods.description: Undo the last command.
methods.returns: true if undo was successful, false if nothing to undo

methods.name: redo
methods.description: Redo the last undone command.
methods.returns: true if redo was successful, false if nothing to redo

methods.name: canUndo
methods.description: Check if undo is available.

methods.name: canRedo
methods.description: Check if redo is available.

methods.name: getUndoDescription
methods.description: Get the description of the next undo command.

methods.name: getRedoDescription
methods.description: Get the description of the next redo command.

methods.name: clearHistory
methods.description: Clear all history.

methods.name: getUndoCount
methods.description: Get the number of commands in undo history.

methods.name: getRedoCount
methods.description: Get the number of commands in redo history.

methods.name: solve

parameters.name: constraints
parameters.description: The list of active constraints to solve.

methods.description: Solves the system of constraints for the given sketch.
methods.returns: true if solved (converged), false if max iterations reached.

constructors.name: Dimension
constructors.signature: public Dimension(DimensionType type, double value, String unit)

methods.name: formatValue
methods.description: Formats the numeric value with appropriate precision.
methods.returns: Formatted string

methods.name: updateLabel
methods.description: Updates the label with current value and unit.

methods.name: setUnit
methods.description: Sets the unit for this dimension.

constructors.name: FixedConstraint
constructors.signature: public FixedConstraint(Point point, float x, float y)

methods.name: getCurrentShape
methods.description: Gets the currently active shape type for rendering decisions.
methods.returns: Current Shape enum value

methods.name: getParam
methods.description: Gets the size parameter of current shape (cube size or sphere radius).
methods.returns: Size/radius parameter value

methods.name: getLoadedStlTriangles
methods.description: Gets triangles from loaded STL file for rendering. v2y, v2z, v3x, v3y, v3z]
methods.returns: List of triangle arrays with format [nx, ny, nz, v1x, v1y, v1z, v2x,

methods.name: getExtrudedTriangles
methods.description: Gets triangles from extruded sketch for rendering. v2y, v2z, v3x, v3y, v3z]
methods.returns: List of triangle arrays with format [nx, ny, nz, v1x, v1y, v1z, v2x,

methods.name: getModelMaxDimension
methods.description: Calculates maximum dimension of current model for auto-scaling views.
methods.returns: Maximum width, height, or depth of the model

methods.name: loadStl
methods.description: Loads STL file and parses triangles into internal format. Sets current shape to STL_LOADED on success.

methods.name: centerModel

parameters.name: centerX
parameters.description: The X-coordinate of the model's current center

parameters.name: centerY
parameters.description: The Y-coordinate of the model's current center

parameters.name: centerZ
parameters.description: The Z-coordinate of the model's current center

methods.signature: private static void centerModel(float centerX, float centerY, float centerZ)
methods.description: Centers the loaded STL model by translating all vertices so that the model's center becomes the origin (0, 0, 0). This ensures proper rotation around the center.

methods.name: createCube
methods.signature: public static void createCube(float size, int divisions)
methods.description: Creates a procedural cube with specified size and subdivisions.

methods.name: createSphere
methods.signature: public static void createSphere(float radius, int divisions)
methods.description: Creates a procedural UV sphere with specified radius and subdivisions.

methods.name: createSphere
methods.signature: public static void createSphere(float radius, int latDiv, int lonDiv)
methods.description: Creates a procedural UV sphere with specified radius and separate lat/lon subdivisions.

methods.name: generateCubeTriangles

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the cube's edge.

methods.signature: private static void generateCubeTriangles(float size, int divisions)
methods.description: Generates triangle data for a cube centered at the origin and stores it in loadedStlTriangles. The cube extends from -size/2 to +size/2 in all dimensions.

methods.name: generateSphereTriangles
methods.signature: private static void generateSphereTriangles(float radius, int latDiv, int lonDiv)
methods.description: Generates triangle data for a sphere centered at the origin and stores it in loadedStlTriangles.

methods.name: calculateTriangleNormal
methods.signature: private static float[] calculateTriangleNormal(Sketch.Point3D p1, Sketch.Point3D p2, Sketch.Point3D p3)
methods.description: Calculates the normal vector for a triangle defined by three 3D points.
methods.returns: Normal vector as float array [nx, ny, nz]

methods.name: saveStl
methods.description: Saves current geometry (cube, sphere, loaded STL, or extruded shapes) to STL file.

methods.name: writeLoadedStlTriangles
methods.description: Generates and writes STL facets for the current `loadedStlTriangles` data. This is used when saving a previously loaded STL file.

methods.name: writeExtrudedSketchToStl
methods.signature: private static void writeExtrudedSketchToStl(PrintWriter out, Sketch sketch)
methods.description: Writes extruded sketch geometry directly to STL format. Takes the Face3D objects from the sketch and converts them to triangles.

methods.name: generateCubeStl
methods.signature: private static void generateCubeStl(PrintWriter out, float size, int divisions)
methods.description: Generate STL triangles for a cube and write to output.

methods.name: generateSphereStl
methods.signature: private static void generateSphereStl(PrintWriter out, float radius, int latDiv, int lonDiv)
methods.description: Generate STL triangles for a sphere and write to output.

methods.name: sph

parameters.name: theta
parameters.description: Polar angle (latitude), from 0 (north pole) to PI (south pole).

methods.signature: private static float[] sph(float r, float theta, float phi)
methods.description: Calculate Cartesian coordinates for a point on a sphere given spherical angles.
methods.returns: Cartesian coordinates as float array [x, y, z].

methods.name: writeTriangle

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: Vertex A coordinates as float array [x, y, z].

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: Vertex B coordinates as float array [x, y, z].

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: Vertex C coordinates as float array [x, y, z].

methods.signature: private static void writeTriangle(PrintWriter out, float[] a, float[] b, float[] c)
methods.description: Write a triangle facet to the STL file, computing its normal automatically. This method is used when generating new geometry (e.g., cube, sphere).

methods.name: drawCurrentShape

parameters.name: gl
parameters.description: The GL2 object (OpenGL context) used for drawing.

methods.description: Draws the currently selected 3D shape using OpenGL. This method is called by JOGLCadCanvas's display method. It handles drawing of cubes, spheres, loaded STL models, and extruded sketches.

methods.name: drawCube

parameters.name: divisions
parameters.description: Number of subdivisions per edge (for finer detail, though

methods.signature: public static void drawCube(GL2 gl, float size, int divisions)
methods.description: Draws a cube using OpenGL. Vertices and normals are calculated on the fly. For high performance with many cubes, consider using VBOs. simple cube just draws 6 faces).

methods.name: drawSphere
methods.signature: public static void drawSphere(GL2 gl, float radius, int latDiv, int lonDiv)

methods.name: drawLoadedStl
methods.description: This uses immediate mode (`glBegin`/`glEnd`), which is simple but less performant for very large models compared to Vertex Buffer Objects (VBOs).

methods.name: calculateCentroid
methods.description: Calculates the Center of Gravity (Volumetric Centroid) of the loaded 3D model. Uses the signed volume of tetrahedrons method.
methods.returns: float array [x, y, z] representing the CG coordinates.

methods.name: revolve

parameters.name: sketch
parameters.description: The sketch containing the profile to revolve.

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description: Number of steps for the revolution.

methods.signature: public static void revolve(Sketch sketch, float angleDegrees, int steps)
methods.description: Revolves a 2D sketch around the Y-axis to create a 3D mesh.

methods.name: rotateY
methods.signature: private static float[] rotateY(Sketch.PointEntity p, float theta)

methods.name: addTriangleToExtruded
methods.signature: private static void addTriangleToExtruded(float[] v1, float[] v2, float[] v3)

methods.name: loft

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height difference between the two profiles.

methods.signature: public static void loft(Sketch sketch, float height)
methods.description: Lofts between the first two polygons in the sketch over a specified height.

methods.name: calculateSurfaceArea
methods.description: Calculates the total surface area of the current model.
methods.returns: Surface area in square units.

methods.name: calculateVolume
methods.description: Calculates the volume of the current model using the divergence theorem. Assumes a closed, watertight mesh.
methods.returns: Volume in cubic units.

methods.name: getActiveTriangles
methods.description: Helper to get the currently active list of triangles.

methods.name: pickFace
methods.signature: public static float[] pickFace(float[] rayOrigin, float[] rayDir)
methods.description: Casts a ray into the scene and finds the closest intersected triangle.
methods.returns: The data of the closest triangle, or null if no hit.

methods.name: calculateTriangleArea
methods.description: Calculates the area of a triangle in 3D.

methods.description: Record a command during macro recording.

methods.description: Load and execute a macro file.

methods.description: List all available macros.

methods.name: getCommandCount

methods.description: Updates the position of this point. Used by the ConstraintSolver.

methods.description: Moves the point to the specified coordinates. Alias for set(x, y).

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Checks whether another object is equal to this point. Uses a small epsilon for floating-point comparison.
methods.returns: true if obj is a Point with approximately equal coordinates

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Generates a hash code based on the x and y coordinates.
methods.returns: The hash code

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the point in (x, y) format.
methods.returns: Formatted string of the point

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the PointEntity.
methods.returns: A string in the format PointEntity(x, y)

methods.signature: package-private public Circle(float x, float y, float r)

methods.signature: package-private public Face3D(Point3D p1, Point3D p2, Point3D p3, Point3D p4)

methods.name: computePerVertexNormals
methods.description: Computes per-vertex normals for all extruded faces (for smooth shading) utilizing a crease angle threshold to preserve sharp edges.

methods.name: addPoint
methods.signature: public int addPoint(float x, float y)
methods.description: Adds a point entity to the sketch.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 if sketch buffer is full.

methods.name: addLine
methods.signature: public int addLine(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)
methods.description: Adds a line entity to the sketch.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 if sketch buffer is full.

methods.name: addCircle
methods.signature: public int addCircle(float x, float y, float r)
methods.description: Adds a circle entity to the sketch.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 if sketch buffer is full.

methods.name: addPolygon

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: List of PointEntity forming the polygon.

methods.description: Adds a polygon entity to the sketch from a list of points.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 if sketch buffer is full or invalid points.

methods.name: addNSidedPolygon
methods.signature: public int addNSidedPolygon(float centerX, float centerY, float radius, int sides)
methods.description: Adds an N-sided regular polygon to the sketch.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 on error.

methods.name: addKite

parameters.name: angleDegrees
parameters.description: Angle (in degrees) of the main diagonal with respect to

methods.signature: public int addKite(float centerX, float centerY, float mainDiagonal, float crossDiagonal, float angleDegrees)
methods.description: the X-axis.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 on error.

methods.name: clearSketch
methods.description: Clears 2D entities from the sketch but PRESERVES extruded 3D geometry. This allows for multi-step macros where we sketch, extrude, clear sketch, and sketch again.

methods.name: clearAll
methods.description: Clears EVERYTHING including 3D geometry.

methods.name: listSketch
methods.description: Returns a list of string representations of all entities in the sketch.
methods.returns: List of strings describing each sketch entity.

methods.name: getEntities
methods.description: Gets all entities in the sketch.
methods.returns: List of all sketch entities.

methods.name: removeEntity
methods.description: Removes an entity from the sketch. Used for undo operations.
methods.returns: true if removed, false if not found

methods.name: isClosedLoop
methods.description: Checks if the sketch contains extrudable shapes. Extrudable shapes include polygons and circles. false otherwise.
methods.returns: true if sketch contains extrudable shapes (polygons or circles),

methods.name: setUnitSystem
methods.description: Sets the unit system for the sketch.

methods.name: getUnitSystem
methods.description: Gets the current unit system.
methods.returns: Current UnitSystem.

methods.name: getUnitsFromDXFCode
methods.description: Converts a DXF unit code to its corresponding unit string.
methods.returns: The unit string.

methods.name: exportSketchToDXF

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Path to the output DXF file.

methods.description: Exports the current sketch to a DXF file. It writes HEADER and ENTITIES sections, including unit information.

methods.name: sketchPoint
methods.description: Parses parameters for adding a point from command-line like input.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 on error.

methods.name: sketchLine

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: String array of parameters (x1, y1, x2, y2).

methods.description: Parses parameters for adding a line from command-line like input.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 on error.

methods.name: sketchCircle

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: String array of parameters (x, y, r).

methods.description: Parses parameters for adding a circle from command-line like input.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 on error.

methods.name: sketchPolygon
methods.signature: public int sketchPolygon(float x, float y, float radius, int sides)
methods.description: Adds an N-sided polygon to the sketch based on provided parameters. This method directly accepts float coordinates and int sides.
methods.returns: 0 on success, 1 on error.

methods.name: loadDXF

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Path to the DXF file to load.

methods.description: Loads a DXF file, parses its header for units, and then its ENTITIES section to populate the sketch with points, lines, circles, and polylines. Includes robust error handling and unit scaling.

methods.name: unitScaleFactor

parameters.name: unitStr
parameters.description: The unit string from DXF header.

methods.description: Provides a scaling factor to convert DXF units to an internal standard unit (e.g., millimeters).
methods.returns: The conversion factor.

methods.name: draw3D

parameters.name: gl
parameters.description: The GL2 object (OpenGL context) used for drawing.

methods.description: Renders extruded 3D faces using OpenGL. This method renders the 3D geometry created by the extrude operation. It converts Face3D objects to triangles and renders them with proper lighting.

methods.name: renderFace3D

parameters.name: gl
parameters.description: The GL2 object for OpenGL rendering.

methods.signature: private void renderFace3D(GL2 gl, Face3D face)
methods.description: Renders a single Face3D object as triangles. Uses triangle fan tessellation for faces with more than 3 vertices.

methods.name: calculateFaceNormal
methods.signature: private float[] calculateFaceNormal(Point3D p1, Point3D p2, Point3D p3)
methods.description: Calculates the normal vector for a triangular face defined by three 3D points. Uses the cross product of two edge vectors.
methods.returns: Normal vector as a float array [nx, ny, nz].

methods.name: draw

parameters.name: gl
parameters.description: The GL2 object (OpenGL context) used for drawing.

methods.description: Renders all entities in the sketch using OpenGL. This method is designed to be called by JOGLCadCanvas's `display` method when the 2D sketch view is active. It iterates through the `sketchEntities` list and uses OpenGL primitives to draw each type of entity.

methods.name: findClosestEntity
methods.signature: public Entity findClosestEntity(float x, float y, float threshold)
methods.description: Finds the closest sketch entity to a given point within a threshold. Used for entity selection when dimensioning.
methods.returns: The closest entity, or null if none within threshold

methods.name: calculateDistanceToEntity
methods.signature: private float calculateDistanceToEntity(Entity entity, float x, float y)
methods.description: Calculates the distance from a point to an entity.

methods.name: distanceToLineSegment
methods.signature: private float distanceToLineSegment(float px, float py, float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)
methods.description: Calculates distance from a point to a line segment.

methods.name: createDimensionFor
methods.description: Creates an appropriate dimension for the given entity.
methods.returns: A dimension object, or null if entity type not supported

methods.name: addDimension
methods.description: Adds a dimension to the sketch.

methods.name: removeDimension
methods.description: Removes a dimension from the sketch.

methods.name: getDimensions
methods.description: Gets all dimensions in the sketch.

methods.name: clearDimensions
methods.description: Clears all dimensions from the sketch.

methods.name: extrude

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the extrusion in the Z direction.

methods.description: Extrudes all closed shapes in the sketch to create 3D faces. Handles polygons, circles, and potentially connected line loops. Creates side faces, top faces, and bottom faces for each extrudable shape.

methods.name: extrudePolygon
methods.signature: private void extrudePolygon(Polygon polygon, double height)
methods.description: Extrudes a single polygon to create 3D faces.

methods.name: extrudeCircle
methods.signature: private void extrudeCircle(Circle circle, double height)
methods.description: Extrudes a circle to create a cylindrical shape.

methods.name: findClosedLoopsFromLines
methods.description: Finds closed loops formed by connected lines in the sketch. This method analyzes all Line entities and attempts to find sequences of connected lines that form closed polygonal shapes.
methods.returns: A list of closed loops, where each loop is a list of points

methods.name: isPointsEqual
methods.signature: private boolean isPointsEqual(Point2D p1, Point2D p2)
methods.description: Helper method to check if two points are equal within a small tolerance.
methods.returns: true if points are equal within tolerance

methods.name: extrudeClosedLoop

parameters.name: loop
parameters.description: The closed loop of points to extrude

methods.signature: private void extrudeClosedLoop(List<Point2D> loop, double height)
methods.description: Extrudes a closed loop of points to create 3D faces. This method treats the loop as a polygon and creates the corresponding 3D geometry including side faces, top face, and bottom face.

methods.name: getExtrudedTriangles
methods.description: Converts extruded 3D faces to triangles for OpenGL rendering. Each face is triangulated and returned as an array of float values compatible with STL triangle format (normal + 3 vertices).
methods.returns: List of triangle arrays for OpenGL rendering

methods.name: triangulateFace
methods.description: Triangulates a 3D face into triangles for rendering. Uses fan triangulation for faces with more than 3 vertices.
methods.returns: List of triangles representing the face

methods.name: createTriangle
methods.signature: private float[] createTriangle(Point3D p1, Point3D p2, Point3D p3)
methods.description: Creates a triangle array from three 3D points. Calculates the normal vector and formats as STL triangle.
methods.returns: Triangle array [nx, ny, nz, x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2, x3, y3, z3]

methods.name: generateNaca4

parameters.name: pointsPerSide
parameters.description: Number of points for upper/lower surface.

methods.signature: public int generateNaca4(String digit4, float chord, int pointsPerSide)
methods.description: Generates a 4-digit NACA airfoil profile.
methods.returns: 0 on success, -1 on failure.

methods.name: getClosestEntity
methods.signature: public Entity getClosestEntity(float x, float y, float tolerance)
methods.description: Finds the closest entity to the given coordinates within a tolerance.
methods.returns: The closest Entity or null if none found within tolerance

methods.name: distancePointToSegment
methods.signature: private float distancePointToSegment(float px, float py, float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)

methods.name: toMeters
methods.description: Returns the Length conversion factor to Meters (SI base). Useful for inter-unit calculations.

methods.name: getDXFCode
methods.description: Returns the DXF unit code for this system.

methods.name: fromDXFCode
methods.description: Resolves a UnitSystem from a DXF integer code.

methods.name: getAbbreviation
methods.description: Returns the abbreviated unit label for display in dimensions.
methods.returns: Short unit string (e.g., "mm", "in", "ft")

methods.name: start
methods.description: The main entry point for the JavaFX application. Initializes the Unit Selection Splash Screen.

methods.name: showUnitSelectionWindow
methods.description: Displays a lightweight startup window for unit selection. This avoids blocking the event dispatch thread on macOS.

methods.name: initializeMainUI
methods.description: Initializes and displays the main application window. Called only after unit selection is complete.

methods.name: cleanupAndExit
methods.description: Properly cleans up resources and exits the application. This method should be called whenever the application needs to terminate, whether through window close, exit button, or programmatic exit. It ensures all resources are properly released before termination.

methods.name: initializeComponents
methods.description: Initializes all the UI components (TextAreas, TextFields, ComboBoxes). This method is called once during the application's startup.

methods.name: initializeGLCanvas
methods.description: Initializes the JOGL GLCanvas component. This involves setting up OpenGL capabilities, adding event listeners for mouse and keyboard interaction, and wrapping it in a SwingNode for integration into the JavaFX scene. This method uses SwingUtilities.invokeLater to ensure GLCanvas creation on the correct thread.

methods.name: createControlPanel
methods.description: Creates and configures the control panel (left side of the main split pane). This panel contains TitledPanes for commands and parameters.
methods.returns: A VBox representing the control panel.

methods.name: createSectionLabel

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text content for the label.

methods.description: Helper method to create a bold section label for UI organization.
methods.returns: A Label with bold font and increased font size.

methods.name: updateProjectionMatrix

parameters.name: drawable
parameters.description: The GLAutoDrawable object to get dimensions from.

methods.description: Updates the projection matrix with adaptive clipping planes based on current zoom and model size. This prevents clipping artifacts when rotating large models or when zoomed far out.

methods.name: renderSketch

parameters.description: The GL2 object for OpenGL drawing commands.

methods.signature: public void renderSketch(GL2 gl, GLAutoDrawable drawable)
methods.description: Renders the 2D sketch elements using the Sketch class's built-in draw method. This is much more efficient than parsing string representations. Uses proper aspect ratio to ensure circles appear round, not oval. Completely independent of 3D view transformations. Supports 2D view manipulation (pan and zoom).

methods.name: mouseClicked
methods.description: 1. JOGL canvas needs Swing focus for mouse events 2. SwingNode needs JavaFX focus to prevent arrow key capture by UI traversal 3. Both must be coordinated to prevent focus conflicts

methods.name: mouseDragged
methods.description: MouseMotionListener implementation for the GLCanvas to handle mouse dragging. Supports both 3D rotation (for models) and 2D panning (for sketches).

methods.name: mouseWheelMoved
methods.description: MouseWheelListener implementation for the GLCanvas to handle zooming. Supports both 3D zoom (for models) and 2D zoom (for sketches).

methods.name: keyPressed
methods.description: - R: Reset 3D view with auto-scaling Universal Controls: - SPACE: Toggle between 2D/3D view modes - ESC: Force canvas focus restoration - Ctrl+H: Display keyboard help

methods.name: performUndo

methods.name: performRedo

methods.name: activateDimensionTool
methods.description: Activates the dimension tool for measuring entities. User can click entities to create dimensions.

methods.name: handleDimensionClick
methods.signature: private void handleDimensionClick(float worldX, float worldY)
methods.description: Handles a click when dimension tool is active. Finds the closest entity and creates a dimension for it.

methods.name: orientViewToPlane

parameters.name: planeName
parameters.description: The name of the plane (e.g., "Front Plane", "Top Plane",

methods.description: Orients the 3D view to align with the selected plane. Double-clicking a plane in the feature tree calls this method. "Right Plane")

methods.name: toggleSketchView
methods.description: Toggles between 2D sketch view and 3D model view.

methods.name: resetView
methods.description: Resets the 3D view to default position with auto-scaling zoom. Clears rotation and sets zoom based on model size for optimal viewing.

methods.name: showKeyboardHelp
methods.description: Displays comprehensive keyboard controls help in the console output. This method provides users with a quick reference guide for all available keyboard shortcuts and controls. It's triggered by pressing Ctrl+H and outputs a formatted help message to the console area. Updated to include both 2D sketch manipulation and 3D model controls.

methods.name: appendOutput
methods.description: Appends text to console output with thread-safe execution. Uses Platform.runLater() for JavaFX thread safety and auto-scrolls to bottom.

methods.name: getSketchWorldCoordinates
methods.signature: private float[] getSketchWorldCoordinates(int screenX, int screenY)
methods.description: Converts screen coordinates to sketch world coordinates. Assumes standard 2D orthographic projection matches current pan/zoom.

methods.name: help
methods.description: Shows available commands and basic keyboard controls in console. Lists all GUI commands and directs users to Ctrl+H for detailed help.

methods.name: showSaveDialog
methods.description: This method provides a comprehensive file saving interface that supports multiple formats and includes robust error handling. It presents a file chooser dialog for user selection and delegates to format-specific save methods based on the chosen file extension.

methods.name: loadFile
methods.description: This method provides a comprehensive file loading interface that automatically detects supported formats and delegates to appropriate parsing methods.

methods.name: exportDXF
methods.description: This method provides a specialized export interface specifically for DXF format, which is widely supported by CAD applications. It handles the complete export process including file selection, format conversion, and error management.

methods.name: sketchClear
methods.description: Post-Clear State: - Empty sketch ready for new geometry - Clean coordinate system - Reset entity counters - Canvas automatically refreshed

methods.name: sketchList
methods.description: This method provides detailed inspection capabilities for the sketch contents, outputting a formatted inventory of all geometric entities with their properties and relationships. Essential for debugging complex sketches and verifying geometry accuracy.

methods.name: extrudeSketch
methods.description: polygons. // Legacy sketch methods (sketchPoint, sketchLine, sketchCircle, sketchPolygon) removed /** Extrudes the current 2D sketch into a 3D shape. Opens a custom dialog window to get the extrusion height from the user.

methods.name: showKiteDialog
methods.description: Shows a dialog to collect polygon parameters before drawing.

methods.name: showCreatePlaneDialog
methods.description: Shows dialog for creating a custom reference plane. User can define name and orientation angles.

methods.name: showUnitSelectionDialog
methods.description: Shows the unit selection dialog at application startup. Allows user to choose their preferred unit system.

methods.name: setApplicationUnits
methods.description: Sets the application-wide unit system. Updates sketch and current units field.

methods.signature: public void reshape(GLAutoDrawable drawable, int x, int y, int width, int height)
methods.description: and perspective for either 3D or 2D rendering.

methods.name: display
methods.description: This method is called repeatedly by the animator to render the scene. It clears the buffers, applies camera transformations, and then draws either the 3D model (cube, sphere, or STL) or the 2D sketch based on the current display mode (`show3DModel` flag).

methods.name: calculateGeometryCenter
methods.description: Calculates the center point of the current geometry. For extruded shapes, calculates the centroid of all vertices. For default shapes (cube, sphere, STL), returns the origin.
methods.returns: Array containing [centerX, centerY, centerZ] coordinates

methods.name: calculateGeometrySize
methods.description: Calculates the bounding box dimensions of extruded geometry to help with automatic zoom.
methods.returns: Maximum dimension (width, height, or depth) of the geometry

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: This method is called when the OpenGL context is destroyed (e.g., when the GLJPanel is removed from its parent container or the application exits). It's used to release any OpenGL-related resources.
